meanings.sent1: Johnson is a common name for boys.
meanings.sent3: Johnson always makes me think of a friendly face.
meanings.sent4: The name Johnson stands out in a crowd.
meanings.sent5: When I hear Johnson, I picture a smiling boy.

meanings.definition: A slang term for a penis.
meanings.sent1: He got hit in the johnson during the game.
meanings.sent2: The doctor asked if he had any pain in his johnson.
meanings.sent3: It's funny how 'johnson' can mean a name or something else.
meanings.sent4: He protected his johnson like it was a precious gem.
meanings.sent5: The word 'johnson' can make some people blush.
